events.message: I purchased a jacket last week but it doesn't fit at all. I want to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
The case has been reviewed and categorized under Refund based on the customer's request for money back.
Support agent Maria Thompson has been assigned to handle the refund request for the returned jacket.
Hello! This is Maria from customer support. I understand you'd like to return your jacket for a refund. I'm here to assist you.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in its original packaging for the return process?
The order number is 6729483. Yes, the jacket is unused and still has the tags attached in the original packaging.
Thank you for the details. Please use the prepaid return label we will email shortly and once we receive the jacket, we will process your refund within 5 business days.
That sounds great. I appreciate the quick instructions and look forward to receiving the label via email.
We have received your returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should appear on your original payment method shortly.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with today.
Since you confirmed receipt of the refund, we are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting support.
We have sent you a short survey to rate your experience with our refund process. Your feedback is very important to us.
